column4: how can i reinstall deluge bittorrent client? ..... because i am trying to just start the app and it just does not want to start...
if you start deluge from the terminal, does it give any useful errors ?
just type deluge on terminal?
yep, if thats the name of the program
yes it is
http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/25982/    there it is
that looks pretty bad for an error, can i ask how you installed deluge ? as its not in the ubuntu repositories
mmm i think i just download it a package, from deluge's site or something, it worked well for a while, but suddenly it crashed
was it a .deb file ?
not sure if it is in the repositories
yes it was a .deb
i dont believe it is, search shows nothing anyways
deluge-torrent_0.5.0-0~getdeb1_i386.deb
ok so because you installed a deb, this is no problem :-) so sudo aptitude purge deluge, then reinstall the deb file as before
there it is
ok ok i will
ok i just tried and appears a message Error: a later version is already installed
when i was trying to install the .deb package
mmm i am downloading the package with apt-get, i hope it works
still doesn't starts
if you already had a version installed, it would need to be purged removed to remove settings
yeah i actually did it, then i used sudo apt-get install deluge-torrent, and worked, but im still unable to start the program
im sorry i dont know what else to try, maybe check the deluge website/forum and ubuntuforums for more info
ok thx man
